briefTitle: Pregnant Exposure to Persistent Organic Pollutants
officialTitle: Pregnant Exposure to Persistent Organic Pollutants With Endocrine Disrupting Activity and Development of Breast Cancer in the Next 15 Years: Longitudinal Prospective Cohort Nested Case-control Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: the Number of blood samples usable by return of patient non-opposition
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

woman who gave birth between 2002 and 2005 to a boy whose cord blood was stored in a 2002/2005 PHRC.
